author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Government has issued a gazetted notification implementing the prohibition of 344 fixed dose combination drugs barred by the Central Drugs Standards Control Organisation.

Based on the Gazette Notification all the drug manufacturing units, drugs wholesale and retail drugs stores (Medical stores) within the Union Territory of Puducherry (comprising Puducherry, Karaikal, Mahe and Yanam) are prohibited from manufacture for sale, sale and distribution of the 344 prohibited drugs in the U.T.

Details on website

The drugs have been banned under Section 26A of the Drugs and Cosmetics Act. The details of 344 prohibited drugs are available in the website of CDSCO (www.cdsco.nic.in).
title: Notification issued on banned drugs
